com.mygdx.game

Class SpiderBoiGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
      • com.mygdx.game.SpiderBoiGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class SpiderBoiGame
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    This is the SpiderBoiGame class, the game is created rendered and disposed in here.

      • playGame

        public void playGame(int level)
        This method has the logic of the game. It holds the collision checkers, knot checkers, spiderBoi, and draws the silk. It also renders the background. Also holds the ending state of the game (winObstacle).
        Parameters:
        level - is the level number that takes their data from theit .txt files.

      • touchDown

        public boolean touchDown(int screenX,
                         int screenY,
                         int pointer,
                         int button)
        This method helps set the changes between menus (game state is the menus' names. main menu = 1 and leveselection = 2)
        Specified by:
        touchDown in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Parameters:
        screenX - is the x coordinate of the pressed location.
        screenY - is the y coordinate of the pressed location.
        pointer - unused
        button - unused
        Returns:
        true when the method is called.

      • touchDragged

        public boolean touchDragged(int screenX,
                            int screenY,
                            int pointer)
        This method takes the touch inputs about when the user swipes right, left, up or down. It sets teh direction and calls the move method.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        If the knots made by the player exceeds the max allowed knots hte game ends and the game returns the player to the level selection screen.
        Returns:
        a boolean value checking if the game is over or not.
